Posts.Content: Jan 26, 2009 06:27PM KarenRuns wrote: It was SOOO great to meet all you beautiful and funny girls! I had such a great time talking about anything and everything. I can't stop thinking about everyone. Ann, I see you made it all the way home! Chrissy, I can't believe you live so close and we didn't know each other! Robin, ya made me wanna go skiing again. Watson, you just crack me up. I forgot who's getting a tattoo with me. Great seeing Beth again. A wanna give you all a great big group hug! karen
Posts.Title: This is the "What Would You Like To Bring to the Pahtay" Thread KellyC AnnNYC
